members.name: Angela
abilities: Celestial light projection
Protective warding auras
Emotional healing and comfort
members.bio: Angela, known as Celestial Angel, is the heart-center of the Olympians and the Cummings clan. Her light shields and quiet strength keep the wider family grounded when the cosmos goes sideways.
history: Stood as an early moral anchor for the future Titans and Olympians
Sheltered younger cousins during the early threats around Zion City
Helped Night Hawk and Emma reconcile duty, faith, and hero work
members.notes: Often depicted as a calm, radiant presence—if she raises her voice, everyone knows it’s serious.

members.name: Todd
members.role: Tactical overseer and starship legacy holder
abilities: Stellar-energy channeling
Long-range battlefield awareness
Starship command intuition
members.bio: Todd, called Stellar, carries the legacy of the USS Angel-A and serves as a quiet strategist behind many Parliament-era operations. His counsel guides Night Hawk and the cousins when stakes go cosmic.
history: Supported early Titans operations from the periphery of Zion City
Passed down the legacy of the Angel-A and exploration values to his children
Helped unify extended family branches into the Olympians framework
members.notes: Seen as both a dad and an admiral figure—rarely out front, but always watching the board.

members.name: Molly
abilities: Danger sense around the family home
Morale boosting
Unconditional loyalty
members.bio: Molly, the Teddy Bear, is more than a pet—she’s an emotional anchor. When the heroes come home from impossible missions, she’s the first to greet them like nothing could ever take them away.
history: Present through the formative years of Night Hawk and Emma
Comforted family members after multiple post-Incident losses and scares
members.notes: In-universe jokes claim she has a higher emotional-resilience stat than most heroes.

members.name: Mary
members.role: McNeil family matriarch and moral compass
abilities: Golden barrier generation
Supportive aura that strengthens allies
Resource-blessing (boosting supplies and logistics)
members.bio: Mary, known as Auric, is the golden backbone of the McNeil line. Her calm strength and protective nature helped raise three of the core Titans and hold the extended family together.
history: Raised Spencer, Jared, and Jennifer through the pre-Incident era of Zion City
Protected extended family safe houses during early Maw incursions
Frequently mediates between fiery personalities in family councils
members.notes: Her power theme is ‘golden stewardship’—protecting both people and what sustains them.

members.name: Chance
abilities: Crimson energy greatsword manifestation
Command auras that sharpen ally focus
Tactical foresight in chaotic battles
members.bio: Crimson Crown is a field-general archetype: stoic, decisive, and fiercely protective of his family and city. His influence helped push Spencer toward leadership and honor instead of bitterness.
history: Encouraged Spencer’s transition from raw power to true leadership as Annihilator
Helped evacuate civilians during early waves of The Incident
Occasionally consulted by the Parliament for ground-level perspectives
members.notes: His crown motif symbolizes responsibility, not ego—he wears the weight of his choices.

members.name: Ava
abilities: Prismatic energy bursts that can heal, shield, or stun
Color-coded signal flares for complex coordination
Emotional resonance that calms panic in civilians
members.bio: Ava channels prismatic energy as a flexible support power, switching between roles depending on what the family needs in that moment.
history: Served as a field medic and signal officer for family-led operations
Helped stabilize injured Legionaires and younger Olympians after Maw skirmishes
members.notes: Her color palette and effects often echo the emotional state of the group she’s with.

members.name: Charlie
abilities: Heavy arcane-tech armor
Superhuman strength and durability
Shield-based crowd control
members.bio: Charlie, the Iron Olympian, is built like a walking fortress—often placed where the line absolutely cannot break.
history: Helped hold defensive lines in the Telestial sector during multiple evacuations
Often partners with cousins from the Cummings side when heavy support is needed
members.notes: Quiet off the field, thunderous on it.

members.name: Lumi
abilities: Blending into low light and shadowy environments
Finding isolated or injured family members
Soothing anxiety through presence
members.bio: Lumi is the shadow-pup of the McNeils, often found right beside those who’ve just come back from something traumatic.
history: Frequently present during debriefs after high-risk missions
Became unofficial mascot of several smaller rescue ops involving younger cousins
members.notes: Fans joke that Lumi and Molly have their own secret side-team.

members.name: Heather S
abilities: Plant and growth manipulation
Regenerative healing fields
Environmental shielding with living barriers

faction_connections: Thunder Born (through Ben and Azure’s network)

members.bio: Heather S, Verdant, is a living greenhouse of protection and calm, providing a literal and emotional safe space for the Briggs and their extended family.
history: Sheltered family and allies in living sanctuaries during Outer Darkness incursions
Helped Ben and Azure stabilize after high-intensity missions with healing fields
members.notes: Her gardens are half battlefield tool, half sacred family refuge.

members.name: Bobby
members.role: Primary combat medic of the Briggs branch
abilities: Advanced medical expertise enhanced by arcane-tech tools
Stabilizing auras that slow bleeding and dampen pain
Rapid triage analysis in chaotic situations
members.bio: As Crown Medic, Bobby operates on the front lines of disaster, patching up heroes and civilians alike.
history: Provided emergency support during multiple Titan missions gone sideways
Helped design standard medical response kits used across Olympian branches
members.notes: He has a reputation for firm bedside manner: kind, but no nonsense.

members.name: Liberty
abilities: Calming aura fields that reduce aggression
Light barriers that deflect attacks without harming attackers
Empathic sensing to read emotional tension
members.bio: Liberty embodies serenity in motion, often placed between clashing personalities or on the edges of tense negotiations.
history: Helped de-escalate multiple near-fights between different factions and teams
Frequently deployed when Maw trauma fallout causes panic in safe zones
members.notes: Her armor and aura design deliberately evoke peace, not intimidation.

members.name: Ammon
abilities: Courage amplification for nearby allies
High-mobility melee combat
Energy constructs shaped like shields and banners
members.bio: Valoron charges where others hesitate, turning fear into momentum.
history: Led several dangerous pushbacks when Telestial forces breached safe perimeters
Known for refusing to abandon pinned-down allies even against bad odds
members.notes: High synergy with Liberty’s calming fields and Heather’s plant shields.

members.name: Piper
abilities: High-speed flight
Precision strike runs
Long-range recon and rapid relay
members.bio: Jetstrike is the family’s quickest aerial blade, scouting ahead and hitting hard when needed.
history: Often first on scene for family-based response missions
Worked joint ops with Titans and Cobros 314 as fast air support
members.notes: Probably has the best ‘flybys past Night Hawk’s car’ stories.

members.name: Gemma
members.role: Agile family scout and emotional support
abilities: High-speed ground scouting
Tracking family members by scent even across chaos
Comic relief and morale restoration
members.bio: Gemma, the Slendowg, is the long-legged streak of joy sprinting through the Briggs household and battle lines alike.
history: Known for finding lost kids and cousins during large family events and evacuations
Unofficial mascot for multiple younger Olympians
members.notes: Her codename is as much an inside joke as it is a legend.

members.name: Savannah
abilities: Emotion-linked light auras that brighten ally morale
Colorfield bursts that disorient hostile forces
Low-level healing warmth through touch and proximity
Protective flares that deflect minor projectiles
members.bio: Savannah "Vivid Spark" Jensen is the heartlight of her branch of the family, radiating color, warmth, and stability. Her presence keeps the Jensen household emotionally grounded even when cosmic chaos brushes against their lives.
history: Supported younger Olympians through difficult personal and spiritual transitions
Served as an informal counselor during early Maw disturbances near the family
Helped host several cross-family gatherings that strengthened Olympian unity
members.notes: Her aura tends to brighten and change color based on the emotional state of the room.

members.name: Lee
abilities: On-the-fly scripting of arcane-tech subroutines
Stabilization of glitching or corrupted systems
HUD-assisted diagnostics for damaged armor and devices
Support drones that handle minor repairs mid-mission
members.bio: Lee "Codeforge" Jensen is the quiet engineer behind many of the family’s tech comforts. He’s less of a frontline warrior and more of a craftsman who keeps critical infrastructure humming.
history: Helped adapt civilian tech to handle emergency Parliament alerts
Assisted in refurbishing damaged Olympian armor between battles
Consulted on secure data storage for family records and histories
members.notes: Prefers workbenches and terminals to battlefields but will deploy when the family truly needs him.

members.name: Emilee
abilities: Voice-linked light waves that can soothe or stun
Resonant barriers woven from melody and radiance
Ability to synchronize heartbeats and breathing of nearby allies
Subtle sonic pulses to disrupt hostile coordination
members.bio: Emilee "Luminous Aria" Jensen turns song into shield and spotlight. Her harmonies can settle panic, strengthen courage, and—when necessary—drop enemies to their knees with a single sharp note.
history: Provided musical and emotional support during multiple cross-family gatherings
Assisted in calming civilians during emergency evacuations
Frequently coordinates with other support-focused Olympians for joint operations
members.notes: Her power is at its strongest when she’s protecting people she personally knows.

members.name: Samantha
abilities: Enhanced agility and burst-speed dashes
Kinetic echo trails that confuse pursuers
Parkour-level mobility in urban and interior spaces
Tactical data relays routed through a wrist-comms mesh
members.bio: Samantha "Velocity Vibe" Jensen is motion given purpose. She thrives on weaving through tight spaces, delivering data, and scouting paths before others even know there’s a threat.
history: Served as a runner between Olympians, Titans, and Legionaires during early coordination efforts
Helped map safe routes through Maw-adjacent disturbance zones
Frequently assigned to quick-response errands that require both speed and trust
members.notes: She dislikes staying still and often volunteers for the most mobile roles available.

members.name: Ella
abilities: Low-altitude flight with agile maneuvering
Wind-assisted glides that generate calming ambient tones
Wide-angle visual scouting from above
Subtle pressure-wave bursts to disrupt incoming projectiles
members.bio: Ella "Aerial Serenade" Jensen mixes sky-dancing with soft tactical support. From above, she can both scout ahead and weave gentle sound currents that steady allies’ nerves.
history: Provided overwatch during several extended-family outdoor gatherings and training exercises
Helped spot early signs of Maw storms encroaching near safe zones
Frequently paired with ground-based cousins as their personal aerial guardian
members.notes: Feels most at peace when she has open sky, music in her head, and family within sight below.

members.name: Annie
members.role: Family Counselor & Heart of the Bolanders
members.bio: Annie "Sage Mentor" Bolander is the quiet backbone of the Bolander branch. She is the one everyone calls when life is collapsing, when emotions are raw, and when hard decisions have to be made. Her gift is not just power, but presence: she listens, steadies, and then gently points people back toward hope.
history: Helped mediate early tensions between multiple Olympian branches when powers and responsibility first awakened
Frequently called into Parliament debriefs as an unofficial counselor for shaken heroes
Served as an emotional anchor during The Incident’s aftermath for several Titans and Legionaires
Became known as "Sage Mentor" after repeatedly guiding younger cousins back from burnout and despair
members.notes: Her powers grow stronger the more trust the other person has in her. She rarely fights on the front line, but no major family gathering or crisis is complete without her.

members.name: Paul
members.bio: Paul "Iron Law" Bolander is the shield that stands beside Sage Mentor. Where Annie mends hearts, Paul locks down the field and lays down unbreakable boundaries. He specializes in creating zones where his rules apply—slowing projectiles, dampening powers, and forcing enemies to play fair.
history: Helped design several Parliament-approved engagement protocols for defending civilians during urban conflicts
Served as a defensive pillar during multiple Maw-related incursions, holding choke points alone until reinforcements arrived
Frequently assigned to protect key family members and non-combatants during major crises
Earned the codename "Iron Law" for his unyielding adherence to justice and protective codes
members.notes: His hard-light shields become stronger when defending his family, especially Annie and their kids.

members.name: McKinley
powers: Adrenaline Aura (buffs allies' speed and confidence)
members.bio: McKinley "Rebuncious" Bolander is pure kinetic energy in human form. Loud, chaotic, and impossible to ignore, he thrives in the middle of moving battles where his momentum-based powers let him ricochet through enemy lines and keep morale high.
history: Known for charging into danger to draw fire away from more vulnerable cousins
Turned the tide of several training simulations with aggressive flanking runs and improvised tactics
Often deployed as a distraction unit, forcing enemies to break formation
Developed a reputation for never giving up, even when badly outnumbered
members.notes: The more fun he’s having, the stronger and faster he becomes—something that drives tacticians crazy and delights frontline fighters.

members.name: Whitney
members.bio: Whitney "Veilweaver" Bolander is the subtle one in a loud branch. Where her brothers crash through walls, she rearranges the room so enemies never realize they’re already flanked. She weaves layers of light and sound into illusions that hide allies, misdirect foes, and protect civilians.
history: Provided stealth cover for several covert evacuations when open combat wasn’t an option
Frequently partners with Legionaires and Titans who specialize in precision strikes
Helped design training scenarios that simulate Maw-like disorientation using her illusions
Relied on by younger cousins who feel safer fighting under her cloaking veils
members.notes: Her illusions are most effective when she has time to plan the environment, but she’s learned to improvise under fire.

members.name: Vinson
powers: Armor Reinforcement Aura (buffs nearby allies’ durability)
members.bio: Vinson "Ironchad" Bolander is the youngest Bolander sibling and the hammer of the family. He hits like a freight train, shrugs off impacts that would flatten vehicles, and specializes in breaking enemy momentum with well-placed shockwaves.
history: Joined structured operations later than his siblings but quickly became a core frontline asset
Known for stepping in front of danger when cousins are overwhelmed or pinned down
Participated in training with Titans heavy-hitters to refine control over his shockwaves
Once held a collapsing corridor long enough for an entire squad of Legionaires to escape
members.notes: He jokes a lot and leans into the "Ironchad" nickname, but under the bravado he takes protecting family extremely seriously.

members.name: Wesley
abilities: Reinforced metallic body plating
High-impact damage absorption
Grounded stance that resists knockback and quakes
Support auras that harden nearby allies’ defenses
members.bio: Wesley "Steelframe" Stillman is the physical and emotional anchor of his branch of the family. Calm, steady, and stubbornly unmovable when it counts, he stands between danger and those he loves, turning his entire body into a living barrier.
history: First of the Wesley branch to actively join Olympian operations as a dedicated defender
Held structural lines during early Maw Echo tremors to prevent collapses around civilians and cousins
Frequently assigned to guard ingress and evacuation routes during Parliament emergencies
Helped train younger Olympians in basic durability, stance, and holding the line under pressure
members.notes: He rarely rushes in, but once he plants his feet, almost nothing can push him back.

members.name: Melissa
abilities: Gold-white light constructs that form ribbons, veils, and shields
Soothing light fields that ease fear and worry
Sky-thread bridges of hard light for crossing gaps or reaching height
Radiant beacons that signal and guide allies through smoke or darkness
members.bio: Melissa "Auric Skyweaver" Stillman shapes light into living patterns—bridges, banners, and shields that protect and guide the family. Where Steelframe locks the line down, she paints hope across the sky above it.
history: Created emergency light paths during blackouts so younger cousins could navigate safely
Frequently accompanies Wesley on defense-heavy missions to add flexible shielding and visibility
Helped restore morale after difficult battles by filling the night sky with auric patterns and quiet lightshows
Known for weaving protective veils around children and non-combatants during crises
members.notes: Her auric weaves subtly reflect her emotions—calm patterns when at peace, sharp angles when she’s worried.

members.name: Jackson
abilities: Momentum-based speed boosts triggered by rhythm and motion
Impact strikes that hit harder when timed to a beat
Short dash-blinks in sync with his internal tempo
Minor kinetic redirection that lets him roll with hits instead of taking them full force
members.bio: Jackson "Rhythmic Flux" Stillman moves like a walking playlist—every feint, step, and strike flows in time. When he’s locked into a rhythm, he becomes a blur on the battlefield, slipping through openings and creating them for others.
history: Often serves as a vanguard runner, drawing attention away from less mobile cousins
Helped test timing-based training drills used by younger Olympians to improve coordination
Turned several chaotic skirmishes by syncing with other speed-focused allies to create combo attacks
members.notes: He fights noticeably better when there’s actual music playing, but he can keep tempo in his head if he has to.

members.name: Mason
abilities: Summons partial energy-fortifications (walls, cover, ramparts)
Territory auras that strengthen allies inside his "domain"
Heavy guard stance that protects groups clustered behind him
Symbolic standard projection that rallies morale and focus
members.bio: Mason "Fortress King" Stillman turns any ground he stands on into defended territory. His power isn’t about ruling people—it’s about claiming space so others can stand, heal, and fight without being overwhelmed.
history: Helped design temporary fallback fortifications for large family gatherings in case of attack
Stood as a rear-guard commander during several evacuation drills, ensuring no one was left behind
Frequently paired with cousins who excel in ranged attacks, giving them secure positions to work from
members.notes: He takes responsibility seriously and doesn’t like abandoning a position others are relying on.

members.name: Rylie
abilities: Soft starlight auras that ease fear and doubt
Directional light beams to highlight threats or safe paths
Short-range light-based levitation hops
Burst gleams that briefly blind or distract enemies
members.bio: Rylie "Star Gleam" Stillman embodies quiet hope. She doesn’t overpower the battlefield with blazing light; instead, she shines just enough to remind people they’re not alone and there is still a way forward.
history: Often assigned to stay close to younger or more anxious family members during tense missions
Helped guide groups through darkened corridors during power failures
Known for steadying people with a simple touch and gentle glow
members.notes: Her light is softest but most persistent—the kind that lingers after others fade.

members.name: Sammy
abilities: High-speed sprinting tuned for carrying gear or people
Short-range blink dashes to weave through crowded spaces
Momentum-sharing bursts that briefly speed up nearby allies
Pack-sense awareness that lets him track friendly positions instinctively
members.bio: Sammy "Swift Pack" Stillman is built for running with others in mind—hauling supplies, ferrying messages, and physically carrying those who can’t keep up. He’s the one who’ll go back for someone, even if it means doubling the distance.
history: Served as a primary courier between Parliament wings during simulated lockdowns
Carried injured cousins out of training mishaps more than once
Often the first to volunteer for runs that require stamina and trust
members.notes: She’s at her best when she feels like part of a moving group, not a solo hero.

members.name: David
abilities: Generates metallic armoring around himself or allies
Can forge temporary equipment or barriers using conjured metal
Weight-stabilizing stance that prevents knockback
Metal shaping under battlefield stress (plates, braces, anchors)
members.bio: David "Ironforge" Stillman is a battlefield craftsman—steady, methodical, and impossible to rush. Where chaos rises, he creates structure, forming shields, braces, and anchors that keep his loved ones steady. A quiet protector, his metalwork is as dependable as his presence.
history: Developed improvised armor plates for younger Olympians during early Maw tremors
Frequently reinforces defensive positions created by other family members
Known for calmly stabilizing collapsing structures long enough for evacuations
Taught several cousins basic metal-forming discipline as a grounding exercise
members.notes: His conjured metal always reflects his mood—smooth and orderly on calm days, jagged and heavy when danger rises.

members.name: Isaydy
abilities: Creates blankets of mist that obscure vision but not ally sensors
Localized fog shelters to hide or calm stressed family members
Moisture shaping to create slippery terrain or soften falls
Brief mirage-like illusions formed from water vapor
members.bio: Isaydy "Mist Haven" Stillman is the quiet refuge of her branch. She forms soft fog shelters where those she loves can breathe, regroup, and feel safe. In chaos, her mist shields protect sightlines, slow enemies, and give allies breathing room.
history: Created fog barriers during rescue drills to reduce panic in tight spaces
Used mist veils to guide children away from danger without overwhelming them
Often deployed alongside ranged or defensive cousins to soften enemy approaches
Known for dissolving tense situations with literally cooling air
members.notes: Her mist carries subtle calm—those standing within often feel their heartbeat slow and mind clear.

members.name: Darron
abilities: Forms rock plating around limbs for powerful strikes
Rooted stance that blends perfectly with natural ground
Shockwave stomps that destabilize enemy positions
Can raise small rocky shields or platforms beneath himself
members.bio: Darron "Crag Rock" Stillman embodies raw steadfastness. When he plants his feet, he becomes an obstacle that even enhanced foes struggle to move. His rock-forged plating turns him into a walking bulwark capable of absorbing enormous force.
history: Served as a frontline battering ram during training exercises
Helped stabilize shifting ground during several earthquakes and Maw disturbances
Often stationed near younger cousins to act as a literal wall against threats
Works well with energy-based allies who need a grounded shield
members.notes: Despite his rugged power, he’s gentle with smaller family members—always careful where he steps.

members.name: Isabel
abilities: Short wind bursts for rapid movement
Directional air currents that redirect projectiles
Soft landing control when leaping from height
Can amplify the voices of allies across distance
members.bio: Isabel "Breezestrom" Stillman is a swift-moving scout who glides along the battlefield like a passing wind. Light on her feet and perceptive, she specializes in relaying messages, spotting openings, and helping guide others with gentle streams of air.
history: Often used to relay battlefield signals when coms are disrupted
Assisted with rooftop evacuations by controlling allies' landings
Used wind currents to clear smoke for cousins who rely on visibility
Has guided younger Olympians through obstacle courses using airflow cues
members.notes: Her movements often come with a faint breeze, even indoors.

members.name: Gary Jr.
abilities: Generates broad, shimmering shield barriers
Can project personal shields to protect individual allies
Absorbs kinetic force and redistributes it safely into the ground
Forms temporary crest-shaped wards when anchoring a defensive line
members.bio: Gary Jr. "Legacy Shield" Stillman carries on the protective strength of his parents’ generation. Calm, grounded, and durable under pressure, he acts as the first wall between danger and his loved ones. His shields don’t just block attacks—they inspire confidence.
history: Has acted as the primary defensive anchor for major family gatherings during high alerts
Helped create emergency shield corridors to guide younger members through smoke-filled areas
Often deployed to reinforce Parliament personnel during sudden ruptures or Maw echoes
Trains his children in defensive posture and emotional discipline
members.notes: When he focuses fully, his shields briefly take on the geometric shape of the Stillman family crest.

members.name: Sarah
abilities: Radiates warm emotional fields that dissolve panic and fear
Creates soft zones of safety where tension cannot take root
Amplifies allies’ mental resilience through supportive auras
Projects beams of clarity that cut through confusion or illusions
members.bio: Sarah "Hope" Stillman is the emotional backbone of her branch. Her calm radiance helps family members breathe easier during stress, sharpening their focus and strengthening their resolve. Her presence alone softens fear and strengthens unity.
history: Provided emotional stabilization during several Parliament evacuations
Known for helping younger cousins through trauma after Maw encounters
Supported defenders like Gary Jr. by amplifying their morale and clarity
Creates refuge zones during long missions for rest and regrouping
members.notes: Her aura adapts subtly to the needs of those near her—warm for comfort, bright for courage.

members.name: Josh
abilities: Projects medium-style tactical shields
Can link shields to form multi-person cover
Holds positions even under overwhelming pressure
Redirects incoming force sideways to protect allies behind him
members.bio: Josh "Defention" Stillman follows directly in his father's footsteps, specializing in tactical shield deployment and frontline protection. Less ceremonial than Gary Jr.’s crest-like shields, Josh’s barriers are compact, efficient, and built for rapid combat use.
history: Frequently volunteers for security posts during high-risk operations
Helped protect evacuation groups during sudden Maw flickers
Worked alongside Fortress King to create combined fortification grids
Trains younger cousins in basic shield stances and emergency protection maneuvers
members.notes: He’s direct, brave, and often the first to step between danger and others.

members.name: Garden
abilities: Channels the life-force of nearby plants to empower abilities
Can create sudden bursts of growth (vines, roots, blossoms)
Uses bioenergy pulses to stabilize injured allies
Senses lifeforms and natural patterns across an area
members.bio: Garden "Pharoll" Stillman channels nature’s rhythm into her movements and abilities. She brings restorative energy to the battlefield, using vines and roots to redirect threats while nourishing allies with quiet, stabilizing pulses.
history: Helped regrow damaged terrain following multiple small Maw ruptures
Often paired with light-based cousins to create complementary healing fields
Protected younger family members using fast-growing vine barriers
Trained extensively to control her power’s emotional sensitivity
members.notes: Near plants, her energy strengthens; in forests, she is a force of nature.

members.name: Sophia
abilities: Bursts forward in streaks of shifting color
Changes color trails depending on terrain and tactical needs
Can rebound off surfaces using kinetic color bursts
Creates chromatic flares that briefly distract enemies
members.bio: Sophia "Chroma Sprint" Stillman races across battlefields trailing ribbons of color. Her speed is unpredictable—she shifts hue and intensity based on momentum, creating dazzling patterns that confuse enemies and guide allies.
history: Served as a rapid messenger during Parliament drills
Helped simulate unpredictable enemy movement during training exercises
Used chromatic bursts to signal pathfinding for younger Olympians
Often assists scouts with fast forward recon
members.notes: Her color trails subtly echo the emotional tone of the battlefield.

members.name: Paisley
abilities: Splits light into prismatic bands for illusion or distraction
Creates soft-spectrum shields that distort perception
Can weave colored lines into visual signals for coordinated attacks
Briefly blinds enemies with flarebursts when needed
members.bio: Paisley "Prism Weaver" Stillman bends light into patterns—some defensive, some artistic, all effective. She creates illusions, decoys, and color-coded signals that help coordinate family movements.
history: Designed prismatic patterns used in several Parliament emergency signals
Blinded enemies to protect cousins during ambush conditions
Crafted distraction arrays for rescue teams
Known for her artistic displays after stressful missions
members.notes: Her prismatic weaves often resemble family symbols when she focuses.

members.name: Ellie
abilities: Light gliding jumps supported by faint ethereal wings
Soft-impact movement ideal for sneaking and scouting
Gentle pulses that lift objects or help allies reach higher ground
Can temporarily lighten herself or others
members.bio: Ellie "Ethereal Flutter" Stillman is gentle motion personified. She moves softly, glides effortlessly, and helps others navigate challenging terrain. Her lifting pulses offer both utility and comfort to those around her.
history: Helped lift debris during recovery missions
Served as a mobility aid for younger Olympians during vertical exercises
Used gliding leaps to thread through tight spaces during rescues
Often scouts high ground quietly before others arrive
members.notes: Her movement is so soft that she sometimes seems like a drifting light.

members.name: Jennifer
members.role: Memorial Member – Symbol of Protection, Legacy, and Love
abilities: Symbolic presence that strengthens family unity
Inspires courage in the face of hardship
Serves as a spiritual anchor for the Stillman heritage
members.bio: Jennifer "Eternal Guardian" Stillman represents the heart of the Stillman legacy. Though departed, her memory remains deeply woven into the family’s strength, unity, and compassion. She watches over the Olympians as a reminder of resilience and the importance of holding each other close.
history: Honored by multiple Olympian families during the establishment of the memorial wing
Inspired countless acts of courage and support among her cousins and extended family
Serves as a spiritual reminder of sacrifice, love, and enduring presence
members.notes: The Stillman children frequently place symbols near her memorial stone. Her presence continues to guide the family through hardship.

members.name: Gary
abilities: High-level strategic awareness
Energetic presence that steadies allies’ focus
Authority field that strengthens resolve in his presence
Guides family through complex moral and tactical decisions
members.bio: Gary "Entrpatorial" Stillman is the steady-handed patriarch of the Stillman line. With unmatched intuition and wisdom earned through guiding a sprawling heroic family, he offers structure, discipline, and clarity when the Olympians falter. His presence is a stabilizing force in both crises and everyday life.
history: Acted as a key advisor during the founding of early Parliament protocols
Guided multiple generations of Olympians through hardships and transitions
Known for providing tactical insight during high-stakes family missions
Served as the central bonding figure for the entire Stillman legacy
members.notes: Even when silent, his presence shapes the tone of any room he enters.

members.name: Jeanine
abilities: Generates fields of emotional warmth and safety
Calms conflict through gentle harmonizing energy
Strengthens family bonds during stressful or chaotic moments
Serves as a spiritual centerpoint for Olympian gatherings
members.bio: Jeanine "Hearth Matron" Stillman is the warm heart of the Olympians. She provides comfort, stability, and emotional resilience to the entire family. Her presence creates an atmosphere of safety where wounds—physical or emotional—can begin to heal.
history: Helped unify the Olympians during several early-family rifts
Known for her comforting presence during post-Incident recovery
Played a major role in raising and supporting multiple generations
Holds the family together through empathy, wisdom, and quiet strength
members.notes: Her aura feels like coming home, giving even the strongest heroes a sense of peace.

members.name: Santa Claus
members.role: Mythic Guardian of Joy & Winter Protector
abilities: Mythic winter-based power
Gift-essence projection (hope, joy, warmth)
Frost-forging weaponry
Superhuman resilience and strength
Seasonal environmental manipulation
members.bio: Santa Claus, known to the Olympians as Saint Nicholas, is a mythic winter guardian who stands as a symbol of joy, protection, and warmth. His armor channels celestial holiday energy—hope, generosity, and unity—making him one of the most beloved protectors in the Parliament's extended mythic registry.
history: Assisted in stabilizing Zion City's climate shield during the first Maw cold surge
Provided humanitarian relief during numerous winter crises
Formed alliance with the Olympians during early Parliament goodwill missions
Maintains ancient treaties with elemental winter spirits
members.notes: Though mostly ceremonial, his winter powers are REAL and significantly potent when hope is in danger.

members.name: Sean
abilities: High-durability frontline defense
Momentum-enhancing charge fields
Force redirection through controlled stances
Ally morale amplification
members.bio: Sean "Vanguard" Cummings leads from the front with unwavering courage. He shields his family and allies by transforming momentum into protective force, becoming the pillar every formation relies on.
history: Organized evacuation corridors during Maw echoes
Defended collapsing structures to protect civilians
Served as a frontline reinforcement during Titan deployments
Developed standardized vanguard tactics used by Olympians
members.notes: Never retreats unless pulling allies to safety.

members.name: Heather C
abilities: Life-energy resonance
Emotional calming fields
Subtle terrain influence
Low-level restorative pulses
members.bio: Heather "Sylvara" Cummings grounds the entire branch with emotional stability and peaceful clarity. Her nature resonance keeps panic at bay and allows others to act with purpose.
history: Stabilized distressed Olympians during early Maw events
Assisted recovery teams with emotional regulation
Created calm zones during chaotic evacuations
members.notes: Her energy feels like standing in a quiet forest.

members.name: Bret, aka Small Bret
abilities: Wide-area shielding
Personal barrier reinforcement
High-impact defensive stances
Shock absorption
members.bio: Bret "Aegis" Cummings embodies defense. His shields protect entire squads, allowing others to act fearlessly behind him.
history: Stabilized structures during tremor events
Trains younger Olympians in defensive combat
Acts as anchor in multi-layered defensive lines
members.notes: His shields shine brightest when shielding family.

members.name: Jake
abilities: Star-charged energy bursts
Refractive energy shields
Precision energy knockbacks
Energy field stabilization
members.bio: Jake "Nova Sentinel" Cummings balances offense and defense with stellar energy bursts and refractive shields.
history: Supports midline defenses during family operations
Clears debris with controlled blasts
Provides range cover for heavy defenders
members.notes: His pulses glow brighter with focus or emotion.

members.name: Ailey
abilities: Color-shifting fire
Heat-propelled dashes
Burst-flame melee
Heat wave crowd control
members.bio: Ailey "Chromatic Blaze" Cummings fights with fire shaped by emotion, every flame a streak of color tied to her heart.
history: Cleared frozen zones after Maw cold surges
Often supports speed-based fighters
Developed emotional flame control techniques
members.notes: Her flames resemble brushstrokes when she moves.

members.name: Aubrey
abilities: Healing radiance
Soft levitation
Dawnlight cleansing
Morale reinforcement
members.bio: Aubrey "Seraphine Dawn" Cummings heals with radiant serenity. Her dawnlight calms distress and restores hope.
history: Stabilized injured Olympians during field operations
Supports emotional recovery missions
Works closely with other light-based healers
members.notes: Her light resembles early sunrise.

members.name: James
abilities: Molten energy channels
Explosive melee strikes
Controlled rage amplification
Heat-impact shockwaves
members.bio: James "Dreadforge" Cummings is raw power forged through discipline. His molten strikes break obstacles with overwhelming force.
history: Cleared debris fields during crises
Trains with heavy hitters to refine control
Acts as the family’s breakthrough specialist
members.notes: His molten channels glow brightest under stress.

members.name: Ryan
abilities: Real-time battlefield oversight and planning
Priority-tagging threats and objectives
Boosts ally efficiency through coordination fields
Calm, highly analytical decision-making under pressure
members.bio: Ryan "Managerial" Cummings runs missions like clockwork. He doesn’t just fight—he organizes, prioritizes, and optimizes, making sure every family member is where they’re needed most.
history: Coordinated multiple Olympian responses during early Maw flare-ups
Helped design safe deployment procedures for younger members
Frequently assigned to high-complexity operations requiring tight timing
members.notes: He’s the one you want on comms when everything is going sideways.

members.name: Maren
abilities: Creates soft light veils that shield allies from harm
Calms emotional turbulence with radiant auras
Dampens fear and panic in hostile environments
Marks safe paths with gentle guiding light
members.bio: Maren "Luminary Veil" Cummings wraps her family in light—literally and emotionally. Her glow shields bodies and hearts at the same time.
history: Provided emotional and spiritual support after major Parliament incidents
Stood alongside healers as a stabilizing presence
Guided disoriented allies out of danger with beacon-like light
members.notes: Her light always feels like a warm, safe room after a long day.

members.name: Sasha
abilities: Stores and recalls massive amounts of tactical information
Analyzes enemy patterns and weak points rapidly
Projects holo-diagrams of maps, routes, and plans
Offers real-time intel updates mid-mission
members.bio: Sasha "Codex" Cummings is the walking library of the branch. She remembers details others miss and turns information into survival.
history: Mapped safe routes during unstable Maw zones
Assisted Titans and Thunder Born with threat dossiers
Helps younger cousins understand enemy tactics and history
members.notes: She usually knows the plan… and the backup plan… and the backup for the backup.

members.name: Ian
abilities: Short-range flight or long gliding jumps
Leaves faint spark trails that can signal allies
Fast hit-and-run strikes from above
High mobility in vertical environments
members.bio: Ian "Sparous" Cummings dances through the air, a scouting streak of light and motion. He’s most at home where the battlefield goes vertical.
history: Scouted high-rise zones around Zion during crises
Provided overwatch for ground-based cousins
Delivered rapid messages when comms were down
members.notes: He tends to perch on high ledges even when he doesn’t need to.

members.name: Riker
abilities: Channeling kinetic force into melee attacks
Reinforced armor for brawling at close range
Can anchor himself to the ground to resist knockback
Delivers high-impact strikes that crack enemy defenses
members.bio: Riker "Ironstrike" Cummings hits like a freight train. He’s the one who steps in when a wall—or a monster—needs breaking.
history: Helped breach sealed doors during evacuation missions
Often pairs with defensive cousins on the frontline
Known for stubbornly refusing to fall back once engaged
members.notes: He fights like a tank but laughs easily off the battlefield.

members.name: Dakota
abilities: Blends into shadows and low light
Creates encrypted shadow-fields that hide ally signatures
Analyzes movement in darkness better than normal sight
Can briefly distort enemy perception in dim areas
members.bio: Dakota "Shadow Cipher" Cummings turns darkness into data. Where others see black, they see patterns, routes, and opportunities.
history: Assisted stealth-based missions in low-light regions
Helped track enemies who thought they were hidden
Supports Thunder Born–adjacent ops that require subtlety
members.notes: Despite the shadow theme, they’re not broody—just observant and clever.

members.name: Lora
abilities: Emotion-based shielding that strengthens when protecting loved ones
Generates soft barriers infused with calm energy
Soothing aura that reduces panic and stress
Creates rose-shaped light pulses for gentle crowd control
members.bio: Lora "Roseheart" Cummings radiates warmth, compassion, and strength. She is the emotional center of her branch, offering comfort through powerful, heart-rooted energy shields.
history: Provided relief and emotional stability during Parliament crisis evacuations
Frequently supports younger Olympians with quiet, grounding reassurance
Keeps morale high during long relief missions
members.notes: Her rose-shaped shields are iconic among the Olympians.

members.name: Wayne
abilities: Generates golden authority fields that enhance nearby allies
Creates hardlight constructs shaped like royal insignia
Superb battlefield leadership—commands enhance morale and order
Personal shield that adapts to protect those he claims under his 'sovereign guard'
members.bio: Wayne "Sovereign" Cummings brings commanding presence to the Olympians. His noble-light abilities reinforce order, protection, and unity on the battlefield.
history: Helped maintain order during chaotic Maw-border evacuations
Often leads medium-sized Olympian deployments
Constructs royal insignia barriers to inspire and protect
members.notes: His presence makes allies stand taller without realizing it.

members.name: Elizabeth
abilities: Uses harmonic frequencies to stabilize allies
Creates resonance shields that vibrate to deflect attacks
Sound pulses that disorient enemies without harming them
Can harmonize with other energy users to boost their abilities
members.bio: Elizabeth "Harmony Warden" Cummings manipulates harmonic waves to protect and empower her family. Her resonant shields are as beautiful as they are effective.
history: Assisted healers by stabilizing emotional and physical rhythms
Created resonance zones during crisis shelter operations
Helped calm large groups during high-stress Parliament incidents
members.notes: Her shields emit a soft musical hum.

members.name: Christopher
abilities: Manipulates metal in controlled quantities
Forms armor plates around allies in the moment
Creates reinforced paths or braces structures
Enhances his own durability with metal fusion
members.bio: Christopher "Steel" Cummings is a living alloy of loyalty and strength. His metal manipulation skills make him a cornerstone in rescue and reinforcement missions.
history: Reinforced buildings near collapse during Maw tremors
Often pairs with StoneWreck and Ironstrike for heavy operations
Built barricades that protected families during emergencies
members.notes: His metal constructs always have clean angles and smooth surfaces.

members.name: Tom
abilities: Channels thunder energy into weapons and tools
Forges temporary battlefield enhancements
Strikes with electrified melee force
Can overload machinery with controlled lightning surges
members.bio: Tom "Stormforge" Cummings mixes craftsmanship with thunder. Every swing of his electrified tools is part weapon, part forgework, reshaping the battlefield in sparks.
history: Reactivated damaged Parliament tech with lightning infusions
Helped defend supply lines during regional storms
Crafted temporary bridgeworks using thunder-forged material
members.notes: His forged tools crackle faintly even when dormant.

members.name: Bret
abilities: High-level pattern recognition and analysis
Translates complex data into simple, usable plans
Creates "study fields" that boost ally focus and clarity
Enhances team performance through calm guidance and insight
members.bio: Bret "Doctoral" Cummings approaches everything like a living research project—calm, curious, and thorough. His strength is in understanding systems, people, and problems so deeply that the best solution feels obvious once he explains it.
history: Helped the Olympians document and organize early Parliament encounters
Supported younger family members with long-term planning and life guidance
Often acts as an advisor when missions require layered strategy instead of brute force
members.notes: He’s the one people go to when they say, "I just need to talk this through."

members.name: Angie
abilities: Creates soft, almost invisible protective fields
Amplifies feelings of safety and being watched over
Can sense emotional distress among family within a short range
Subtly redirects danger away from those she’s guarding
members.bio: Angie "Ethereal Guardian" Cummings protects in ways most people never see. Her presence is felt as warmth, reassurance, and the quiet certainty that someone has your back even when you feel alone.
history: Held emotional space for family members after difficult Parliament events
Frequently assigned near children or non-combatants during crises
Known for staying calm and kind when everyone else is fraying at the edges
members.notes: Her power feels less like a shield and more like a hug that nothing can break through.

members.name: Bryce
abilities: Channels rhythm and movement into amplified strikes
Fights best when moving to a beat—literal or imagined
Can sync ally movements into a loose "combat rhythm" for better coordination
Briefly disorients enemies with impact pulses timed like drum hits
members.bio: Bryce "Moesek" Cummings fights like a walking playlist—every swing, dodge, and strike lands on beat. His style looks chaotic until you realize everyone around him is being pulled into his rhythm.
history: Helped coordinate younger cousins during training games and mock battles
Turned chaotic scrambles into surprisingly well-timed group maneuvers
Known for lightening tension, even in heavier moments
members.notes: He’s almost always tapping his foot or fingers to some internal rhythm.

members.name: Lillie
abilities: High agility in close-quarters combat
Uses momentum slides and quick dashes to reposition
Channels energy into lightweight blades for precise cuts
Can weave through crowded areas without losing balance or focus
members.bio: Lillie "Slick Blade" Cummings is stylish, sharp, and quick on her feet. She prefers precision over brute force and rarely swings twice where one clean strike will do.
history: Often volunteers for close-quarters escort roles
Helps keep rowdy cousins in line during sparring matches
Participated in controlled training ops to refine fast-response tactics
members.notes: She hates unnecessary mess—on the battlefield and in life.

members.name: Addie
abilities: Manipulates beams of colored light into paths and trails
Can briefly bend light to create illusionary duplicates or misleading angles
Marks safe routes with visible light patterns only allies recognize
Uses prismatic bursts to disorient or distract threats without harming them
members.bio: Addie "Prism Voyager" Cummings sees the world in angles, color, and possibility. She’s the one who finds the unexpected way through—never straight, but always right.
history: Guided cousins through confusing urban layouts using light trails
Assisted in non-lethal distraction tactics during tense standoffs
Loves exploring new places and mapping safe, clever routes
members.notes: Her prismatic effects look gorgeous in photos—whether she likes it or not.

members.name: Purdy
abilities: Unshakable loyalty
Early warning barks when something feels off
Comforts stressed or sad family members
Refuses to leave anyone behind if they’re hurting
members.bio: Purdy "Old Faithful" is more than a family dog—she’s a constant. When the world feels unstable, she’s a warm presence, a wagging tail, and the reminder that home still exists.
history: Stayed close to family after difficult emotional events
Known to curl up by anyone who’s having a hard time
Has unofficially attended more family councils than some Olympians
members.notes: Her power is simple: she’s always there when it counts.

members.name: Matt
abilities: Rapid analysis of malfunctioning equipment or tech
Generates small support drones that repair, scan, or stabilize
Creates temporary safety barriers to protect wounded allies
Boosts device efficiency through micro-adjustment fields
members.bio: Matt "CareTechnial" Cummings specializes in keeping missions from falling apart—literally. His engineering intuition and calming presence bring order to chaos, repairing what breaks and supporting those who need help in the moment.
history: Performed emergency tech fixes during Parliament instability waves
Assisted healers by stabilizing life-support gear
Frequently assigned to tech-heavy rescue missions
members.notes: He strives to be helpful before being heroic.

members.name: Jessica
abilities: Creates shadow pockets that hide allies from detection
Can neutralize overly chaotic energy fields
Maintains emotional stability for those near her
Generates protective darklight constructs
members.bio: Jessica "Shadowcore" Cummings is quiet strength personified. Her darklight shielding protects family members from threats both physical and emotional.
history: Guided younger Olympians through high-stress emergency drills
Protected teams during rescue operations at night
Serves as emotional backup for overwhelmed cousins
members.notes: Her shadows feel safe, not scary.

members.name: Kyle
abilities: Combines metal manipulation with stealth movement
Can mask his metallic sounds to move silently
Creates razor-thin alloy blades for quick strikes
Good at slipping past defenses unnoticed
members.bio: Kyle "Steelth" Cummings is sharp, quiet, and precise—his style favors slipping into place and striking before anyone notices.
history: Often pairs with stealth cousins during infiltration operations
Helped secure safe corridors in Parliament sectors
Provides recon during tense family missions
members.notes: Moves like a whisper, hits like a hammer.

members.name: Daisy
abilities: Stimulates plant growth in small, controlled amounts
Creates small blossoms that release calming scents
Uses vines and petals to guide or support allies
Sensitive to emotional changes in those around her
members.bio: Daisy "Floral" Cummings is gentle but surprisingly resilient. Her botanical powers offer comfort and subtle battlefield utility.
history: Assisted healers with botanical calming fields
Helped restore damaged community gardens
Supports emotional healing after stressful events
members.notes: Her flowers bloom brighter when she’s happy.

members.name: Rose
abilities: Bends beams of light to create illusions or signals
Creates color-coded communication flashes
Generates small prismatic shields
Can brighten dark areas without blinding allies
members.bio: Rose "Prism" Cummings brings light to any mission—literally. Her refracted light effects are beautiful, useful, and instantly recognizable.
history: Helped guide teams through low-visibility areas
Created prismatic decoys during rescue extractions
Designed symbolic light displays for major family events
members.notes: Her prisms sparkle more when she feels proud.

members.name: Prairie
abilities: Creates small controlled whirlwinds of petals
Moves with dancer-like agility
Uses spinning motion for evasive defense
Creates swirling zones that confuse enemies
members.bio: Prairie "Flowertwister" Cummings mixes movement and nature into a graceful, swirling combat style.
history: Helped clear smoke-filled areas with controlled whirlwinds
Frequently performs during family celebrations
Provides distraction support during light combat training
members.notes: She calls her petals her "dance partners."

members.name: Ryan kid
abilities: Creates dark liquid-like shadows that distract or obscure
Extremely quick reflexes
Can slip through densely packed spaces easily
Uses low-visibility areas to his advantage
members.bio: Ryan "Ven-noir" Cummings moves like ink in water—smooth, quick, and unpredictable.
history: Supported stealth recon during internal Parliament drills
Helped younger cousins navigate dark areas safely
Practices shadow movement with Dakota (Shadow Cipher)
members.notes: He’s sneaky, but not malicious—just playful.

members.name: Liam
abilities: Unwavering loyalty
Senses tension before people notice it
Guards children instinctively
Growls at danger even before it’s visible
members.bio: Liam "Veteran" is the brave guardian of the younger Cummings. He stands watch when others relax, always ready to protect.
history: Stayed close to Prairie during her recovery from a minor injury
Known for breaking up sibling arguments with stern dog energy
Participates in family outings as the unofficial patrol leader
members.notes: He thinks every child is his responsibility.

members.name: Chad
abilities: Analyzes digital systems and battlefield comms in real time
Deploys code-based hardlight panels for cover or routing
Can temporarily "patch" unstable environments or tech glitches
Reads patterns in chaos like a living debugger
members.bio: Chad "Codester" Cummings treats reality a bit like a complex program—something you can understand, stabilize, and improve with the right logic. He’s calm under pressure and great at seeing the next three moves ahead.
history: Helped standardize communication protocols for Olympian operations
Advised Titans and Legionaires on secure data handling
Frequently manages mission logs and post-op debrief summaries
members.notes: He’s the cousin people go to when their tech is acting cursed.

members.name: Rochelle
abilities: Generates soft, pale veils that conceal allies from sight and scanners
Calms emotional noise in tense situations
Can mute sound in a controlled radius for stealth or focus
Specializes in keeping vulnerable or overwhelmed people safe
members.bio: Rochelle "White Veil" Cummings is subtle protection personified. She doesn’t draw attention to herself—but everyone under her veil feels safer.
history: Shielded younger cousins during large family gatherings in unstable times
Provided quiet zones for debriefs and emotional cooldowns
Assisted in stealth extractions where calm and silence were critical
members.notes: Her veil fields feel like stepping into a quiet, softly lit room.

members.name: Annabeth
abilities: Channels faint starlight into gentle beams and pulses
Boosts morale with radiant, hopeful energy
Creates constellation-marked markers to guide allies
Can briefly brighten dark zones without blinding anyone
members.bio: Annabeth "Novanna" Cummings fights with quiet, star-colored hope. Her light doesn’t roar; it reassures.
history: Helped guide cousins through blackouts with constellation trails
Supports healers and guardians with calming light
Known for sitting with people who feel lost or overwhelmed
members.notes: She likes tracing constellations on windows when she’s thinking.

members.name: Levi
abilities: Channels force into the ground to cause localized tremors
Uses heavy, stone-like armor for frontline brawling
Breaks obstacles, debris, or barriers when needed
Protects others by drawing enemy focus to himself
members.bio: Levi "StoneWreck" Cummings is a moving landslide—loud, heavy, and absolutely on your side. He’s built for smashing obstacles that block the family’s way.
history: Cleared blocked paths during localized disasters
Frequently teams up with Steel, Ironstrike, and other heavy-hitters
Known for laughing off impacts that would drop most fighters
members.notes: He’s surprisingly gentle with small kids and animals.

members.name: Child 3
members.bio: Reserved placeholder for a future member of the Chad Cummings branch.
members.notes: Details to be added as canon develops.

members.name: Child 4
members.bio: Reserved placeholder for a future member of the Chad Cummings branch.
members.notes: Details to be added as canon develops.

members.name: Child 5
members.bio: Reserved placeholder for a future member of the Chad Cummings branch.
members.notes: Details to be added as canon develops.

members.name: Troy
abilities: Reads terrain, structures, and layouts at a glance
Quickly assigns roles and positions to make a team more effective
Strengthens existing structures with temporary reinforcement fields
Calls out weak points in enemy positions or fortifications
members.bio: Troy "Foreman" Cummings treats every mission like a job site: who’s on which crew, what needs shored up, and how to keep everyone safe while getting it done. He’s practical, grounded, and very good at turning chaos into a workable plan.
history: Helped coordinate structural reinforcement during Maw-adjacent tremors
Assigned cousins to defensive positions that held far longer than projected
Frequently consulted when operations involve buildings, bridges, or crowded spaces
members.notes: He’s not flashy, but teams run smoother when he’s in charge of placement and flow.

members.name: Sharrel
abilities: Creates soft guiding drafts of air to lead others safely
Senses changes in weather, mood, and environment instantly
Can lighten her steps or glide short distances
Expert at navigating terrain and keeping family groups together

children: The Cummings siblings and their families (multiple branches)

members.bio: Sharrel "Airrow" Cummings is the gentle guidance at the center of the Cummings family. Calm, warm, and always aware of her surroundings, she leads with intuition and patience.
history: Guided younger cousins during large reunions and emergencies
Provided wind signals during early Titan search parties
Known for stepping in quietly whenever someone is lost or overwhelmed
members.notes: Her presence has a soothing, fresh-air feel that everyone notices but can’t quite describe.

members.name: Dorthy
abilities: Preserves memories and family stories with near-perfect clarity
Creates small points of starlight that replay recollections
Soothing presence that calms chaos in emotional situations
Acts as a living archive for the family’s history

children: The Cummings siblings and their families (multiple branches)

members.bio: Dorthy "Star Keeper" Cummings is the heart of the Cummings story. She safeguards the memories, traditions, and emotional threads that hold everyone together.
history: Recorded early Titan events into the family archive
Created star-memory rooms for younger cousins to learn their legacy
Comforted countless family members after stressful events
members.notes: Her starlight projections are famous in family gatherings.

members.name: GMA Parker
abilities: Symbolic guardian presence over the entire Cummings lineage
Represents endurance, unity, and ancestral strength
Serves as a rallying point in moments of crisis or family hardship
Her memory empowers younger Olympians with clarity and resolve
members.bio: GMA Parker "Eternal Archon" stands as the eternal matriarch of the family. Her influence shapes generations, both in legacy and in spirit. Her memory is invoked during major decisions, rites, and reunions.
history: Honored during the founding of the Olympians
Her principles guide many cousin branches to this day
Stories of her life are used to inspire courage, empathy, and resilience
members.notes: Her presence is felt even when not spoken of—an ancestral light that never truly dims.

members.name: Marlyn
abilities: Airflow manipulation for flight-like movement
Creates calming breezes that reduce tension
Navigates storms and weather shifts with ease
Can lift or support others using wind currents
members.bio: Marlyn "Sky Weaver" Eduria embodies grace, compassion, and quiet power. Her wind-woven abilities provide protection and guidance, making her one of the spiritual pillars of the Diwata lineage.
history: Guided younger family members through storms and uncertainty
Helped secure travel routes during Maw disturbances
Acts as a calming presence in family and Olympian gatherings
members.notes: Her movements are so fluid many say she looks like she’s floating.

members.name: Robert
abilities: Summons iron-like armor and shields at will
Extremely durable under physical or energy attacks
Protects groups behind layered iron barriers
Can create vibrating shields that disrupt impacts
members.bio: Robert "Iron Sentinel" Eduria is the steadfast shield of the Diwata family. Calm, strong, and unmovable, he anchors the household with reliability and discipline.
history: Served as the primary guardian during multiple Diwata gatherings
Constructed protective iron structures during emergencies
Assisted Parliament defenders during structural collapse events
members.notes: Despite his strength, he’s gentle and mindful around children.

members.name: Arlene Hendricks
abilities: Generates warm, non-destructive flame for comfort and protection
Can turn heat into controlled bursts for defense
Creates light in dark or uncertain situations
Can redirect harmful fire away from others
members.bio: Arlene "Flame Guardian" Hendricks protects not with destruction, but warmth. Her fire symbolizes care, guidance, and resilience.
history: Provided warmth and protection during cold-weather evacuations
Calmed frightened children with safe, glowing fire shapes
Assisted in lighting disaster areas when power was down
members.notes: Her flames always feel safe — never threatening.

members.name: Nate Hendricks
abilities: Uses sharp, quick wind bursts for defense and offense
Extremely fast reaction time with wind-assisted motion
Can scout ahead using airflow sensors
Works well pairing wind with Arlene’s controlled fire
members.bio: Nate "Wind Striker" Hendricks is swift, precise, and reliable. His wind bursts are controlled and tactical, making him one of the family's most effective scouts.
history: Helped guide rescue teams through smoke-filled areas
Fanned dangerous fires away during emergencies
Assisted in high-speed message relays during outages
members.notes: Nate’s winds always feel focused — never chaotic.

members.name: Kris
abilities: Interfaces emotionally with technology
Can translate machine feedback into intuitive cues
Stabilizes malfunctioning devices by touch
Creates small hologram spirits for guidance
members.bio: Kris "Techno Spirit" Eduria blends heart and circuitry. He acts as a bridge between emotion and machinery, grounding unstable tech with remarkable empathy.
history: Stabilized malfunctioning Parliament drones during a storm surge
Helped build hologram guides for community centers
Supports younger cousins with comforting tech-based apparitions
members.notes: His hologram spirits often act like little AI pets.

members.name: Carlo
abilities: Generates golden mental clarity fields
Helps people focus under stress
Can create harmonic sound pulses that reset emotional balance
Naturally gifted at calming conflict
members.bio: Carlo "Goldenmind" Eduria radiates focus and calm. His golden clarity fields soothe the mind and help others think straight in chaotic situations.
history: Assisted Titans with mental stabilization exercises
Helped resolve emotional conflicts between younger relatives
Created harmonic zones for meditation and recovery
members.notes: Everyone thinks better when Carlo is around.

members.name: Cham Cham Kaleigha
abilities: Creates small localized gravity swirls
Summons faint star-patterned pulses
Can pull small objects into controlled orbits
Energetic and unpredictable but full of heart
members.bio: Cham "Star Vortex" Kaleigha is the youngest spark of the Diwata line. Her powers are energetic, cosmic, and full of excitement — she’s the shooting star of the family.
history: Created swirling gravity orbs during training displays
Often impresses cousins with spontaneous star pulses
Once accidentally orbited her own shoes for an hour
members.notes: Her laughter is as bright as her cosmic pulses.
